text: Dolores, also spelled Delores, is a female given name. It is pronounced [ duh- lawr-is, -lohr- ].The Spanish name Dolores has its roots in the Latin word "dolor," which translates to "pain" or "sorrow." This name is quite common in Spanish-speaking nations and is frequently used as a way to refer to the Virgin Mary. This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). == People == * Dolores O'Riordan, Irish musician * Dolores Hope, American singer, entertainer, philanthropist (1909-2011) * Dolores Claman, Canadian composer (1927-2021) ==References== Category:Given names
title: Dolores
